column4: when I try to mount a newly created ext3 partition (I deleted the old one and made a new one) I am prompted the following message "Unable to mount the volume. mount: mount point swap does not exist" whats wrong?
you need to create the folder where it should be mounted.
you don't code it with gcc, you use a text editor or IDE like Eclipse or Code::Blocks, then you run it through gcc to compile it.
check out oskar's post after the ;
